name: Merry Bloody Christmas, Larry
description:
Critics are saying:
"I've played enough, now." - My fiance, about 27 seconds after starting.

It's my first game, pieced together for the 2018 Extra Credits Holiday Jam. It started out being a retelling of how I got locked out of my building for a few hours thanks to an errant package being delivered on a Saturday, but then quickly ran out of steam in the face of my own incompetence and inability to recognise the fact that there just wasn't a very interesting story there.

So! There are easter eggs and a dragon, if you can put up with it long enough to find them.
